title: Best Collaborator Of All Time
description: Krish is such an amazing Developer and Developer Advocate with excellent skills and abilities. I've gotten the privilege of working with Krish on the 4c website and I must say that it was cos of him that we have such an amazing directory structure on the 4c's repo now. Working with him, I learned a lot working with him as a developer myself and he really showed me new paradigms and more optimal ways to achieve stuff working with him.
